name: WizardTeam
0:
”Alexa, start wizard team”
”Alexa, ask wizard team”
”Alexa, open wizard team”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wizard team
des:
"Wizard Team" is an Alexa skill that works with smart electronic systems built on Raspberry Pi and Arduino to control the behavior of these systems.
To use this skill, the user needs to build a Raspberry Pi system that is authenticated to receive MQTT messages published under the topic of "ArduinoCommand", and is able to send JSON messages to the connected Raspberry Pi/Arduino system to control its behavior. This skill is designed to serve the specific requirements of smart systems built during the "Programming of Smart Systems and Internet of Things" class provided by "Brainy Buddy Education, LLC".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
